name: The Auction is the message
description: This is an experimental Auction, developped as a "hack" in order to bring new features and new collectors to HeN, and accelerate the development of the platform. The Artwork is the auction itself.  A physical plotter drawing will be created with the data (collectors names, bids and dates) during the auction, and the physical copy will be sent to the winner.  At the end of the auction, its data and history will be minted and archived, and the code will be opensourced.
